'''Conductive''' is an [[aura]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* Lightning attacks will only occur if the player's distance from the enemy is greater than '''8m''' and less than '''20m'''.

==Damage==
{{Environmental Damage|4|lightning attacks|truedamage=2}}
